name: Verify that the user is able to perform mid term monetary endorsement.

testSteps.description: 1: Verify that the user is able to perform mid term monetary endorsement. ({AnnualExposure=1000000})

children.description: When underwriter performs endorsement with transaction effective date as policy effective date plus 60

And with Annual Exposure given as
| AnnualExposure |
| 1000000 |
And underwriter completes transaction and policy is endorsed successfully
Then the transaction premium should be the multiplication of transaction premium and prorate factor

testSteps.description: 2: Verify that the user is able to perform mid term monetary endorsement. ({AnnualExposure=20000000})

children.description: When underwriter performs endorsement with transaction effective date as policy effective date plus 60

And with Annual Exposure given as
| AnnualExposure |
| 20000000 |
And underwriter completes transaction and policy is endorsed successfully
Then the transaction premium should be the multiplication of transaction premium and prorate factor
